DataElement.preferredName: Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded Tissue Processor Device Component Reagent Maintenance Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the date that the reagent used in processing FFPE biospecimens was monitored for maintenance.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded Tissue Processor Device Component Reagent Maintenance
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A saturated solution of formaldehyde, water, and typically another agent, most commonly methanol. In its typical form, formalin is 37% formaldehyde by weight (40% by volume), 6-13% methanol, and the rest water._Tissue which is preserved in a fixative solution, usually formalin._Tissue that is preserved and embedded in paraffin._A device designed for preparing or treating a material; also the part of a computer that makes most of the calculations._ Any natural or synthetic substance used in a chemical or biological reaction in order to produce, identify, or measure another substance._The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.

Concepts.definition: A saturated solution of formaldehyde, water, and typically another agent, most commonly methanol. In its typical form, formalin is 37% formaldehyde by weight (40% by volume), 6-13% methanol, and the rest water.
Tissue which is preserved in a fixative solution, usually formalin.
Tissue that is preserved and embedded in paraffin.
A device designed for preparing or treating a material.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
